name: Need for Speed
overview:
High performance racing! Full throttle earnings!

Features:
• 1st Tournament-connected Driving Game with National Prize Pools
• Upgradeable system keeps your game fresh!
• Fully licensed cars from top auto manufacturers. Choose from cars like Ford Mustang SVT Cobra R, Chevrolet Corvette Z06, BMW Z8 and many more!
• Amazing graphics and driving physics
• Gorgeous tracks with fun off-road shortcuts
• Linkable up to 4 cabinets
• Force Feedback Steering
• 6 Speaker Surround Sound!
